name: alanimi
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)), wal(s0, w2))

stmt.origin: imp(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)), wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)), wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)), wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(wa(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, w1)), wal(s0, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)

comment: Variant of ~ al2imi with conjunctive antecedent. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
